title: Perm banned
body:

replies.body:
Typically punishments slowly escalate through the following tiers:

>First offense: 10 game chat restriction
Second offense: 25 game chat restriction
Third offense: 2 week ban
Fourth offense: Permanent ban

The fact you have been banned before, indicates to us that you have a history of unsportsmanlike behavior. While it may not have been something that jumps out immediately as being toxic (such as racism/sexism/homophobia), it is pretty clear from your logs you are creating an unpleasant environment for other players. 

Game 1: You refused to help your teammate because he was playing off meta. You spent a lot of time typing and putting down your team.

Game 2: I'm guessing someone was flaming in here, but you spent a lot of time and effort antagonizing them further (which makes you just as bad as them) instead of muting them and moving on. 

Game 3: Once again you spend a lot of effort into typing nothing positive. Flaming your teammate's champion choice and missing skillshots. If you lane partner was AFK for the game that is unfortunate, but it is still no reason to turn on other members of your team.
